qas.question: When did Congress secure an absolute majority?

answers.text: In the assembly elections held in November 2012

qas.question: How many seats did Congress win?
Who was sworn in as HImachal Pradesh's Chief Minister for a record sixth term?
Who administered the oath of office and secrecy?
Where was the oath of office and secrecy taken?
What did the BJP secure in November 2012?
What was Shimla sworn in as for a 6th term?
At what location did congress secure an absolute majorty in the election?

plausible_answers.text: the oath of office and secrecy

qas.question: What did Virbhadra Singh administer at an open ceremony?
How many seats did Himachal Pradesh win to gain an absolute majority?

context: <a0_0>In the assembly elections held in November 2012<a0_0/>, the Congress secured <b5_0>an absolute majority<b5_0/>. The Congress won <a1_0><b9_0>36 of the 68 seats<b9_0/><a1_0/> while the BJP won only 26 of the 68 seats. <a2_0>Virbhadra Singh<a2_0/> was sworn-in as <b6_0>Himachal Pradesh's Chief Minister<b6_0/> for a record sixth term in Shimla on 25 December 2012. Virbhadra Singh who has held the top office in Himachal five times in the past, was administered <b8_0>the oath of office and secrecy<b8_0/> by <a3_0>Governor Urmila Singh<a3_0/> at an open ceremony at <b7_0>the <a4_0>historic Ridge Maidan<b7_0/> in Shimla<a4_0/>.
